short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple and unobtrusive horizontal progress bar to show how far down a webpage you have scrolled.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When reading a long webpage, it is nice to have a visual aid to see how much progress you've made. This extension adds an unobtrusive horizontal progress bar to the top of your screen that indicated how far down the page you have scrolled.
